description: Multiple-choice quiz testing factual knowledge and critical reasoning skills related to lecture material, assigned readings, and tutorial content from early part of term. Administered in Week 4.

Individual research proposal development involving group collaboration for literature review and brainstorming. Requires designing a developmental psychology study with hypothesis, methodology, and analysis plan. Submitted individually after peer feedback.

2-hour essay/long answer examination during university exam period covering current methods, findings and theories from lectures and tutorials. Tests understanding of developmental psychology concepts and applications.
